alert-email-template::case-type::educati.label: Notice parent failed to pay FPN
Headteacher FPN fine has been paid
Legal Action FPN Case Head Teacher

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

Thank you for your form submission, the Education Welfare team will review the case and contact you with confirmation the case will be taken forward. If two parents have been included in the submission two cases will be raised and you will receive two of these emails. You can view your case at any time by clicking the following link. Please quote the case reference number if you contact the Welfare team. Fixed Penalty Notice reference number: {{ case.reference }}

You can check the progress by going to the My Account page

Yours sincerely
Education Welfare
alert-email-template::case-type::educati.subject: REQUEST TO ISSUE FIXED PENALTY NOTICE

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.html_body:
Dear Education Fines

A new case has been submitted, please review and confirm action.

Fixed Penalty Notice Number: {{ case.reference }}

CXM
alert-email-template::case-type::educati.subject: Fixed Penalty Notice request submitted

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

Fixed Penalty Notice Reference number: {{ case.reference }}

Thank you for submitting a request for a Fixed Penalty Notice.  This email confirms that in accordance with Swindon Borough Councils Code of Conduct, the request for a Fixed Penalty Notice meets the required terms. As a result, the Fixed Penalty Notice will be issued to the parent(s)/Carer.

Yours sincerely

Education Fines
alert-email-template::case-type::educati.subject: Education fines request agreed

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

Fixed Penalty Notice Reference number {{ case.reference }}

Thank you for submitting a request for a Fixed Penalty Notice.  This email confirms that in accordance with Swindon Borough Councils Code of Conduct, the request for a Fixed Penalty Notice does not meet the required terms and the Fixed Penalty Notice will not be issued on this occasion for the following reason:

{{case.values.reason}}

Yours sincerely

Education Welfare
alert-email-template::case-type::educati.subject: Education fines request not agreed

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.html_body:
Dear Admin Team

Fixed Penalty Notice Number: {{ case.reference }}

A request has been raised and is ready to be processed.

CXM
alert-email-template::case-type::educati.subject: Fixed Penalty Notice request raised action needed

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.html_body:
Dear Education Fines (Admin and Officers)

Fixed Penalty Notice Number: {{ case.reference }}

The fine has been paid for this case  and can now be closed on Capita One.

CXM
alert-email-template::case-type::educati.subject: Fixed Penalty Notice fine has been paid

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.html_body:
Dear Business Support Team

The following case has been withdrawn please mark as withdrawn in Capita One.

Fixed Penalty Notice Reference number {{ case.reference }}

The reson for the withdrawal:

{{case.values.reason}}

Education Welfare Officer
alert-email-template::case-type::educati.subject: Withdrawn case

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

Fixed Penalty Notice Reference number {{ case.reference }}

The reson for the withdrawal:

{{case.values.reason}}

Education Welfare Officer
alert-email-template::case-type::educati.subject: Withdrawn Fixed Penalty Notice case

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.html_body:
Dear Education Fines 

Fixed Penalty Notice Number: {{ case.reference }}

The parent/carer associated with this case has failed to pay the Fixed Penalty Notice, please make a decision as to whether PACE questions should be sent to parents or the case should be withdrawn.

CXM

key.label: Notice parent failed to pay FPN

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.subject: Parent failed to pay Fixed Penalty Notice

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.html_body:
Dear Business Support Team

Fixed Penalty Notice Number: {{ case.reference }}

The fine associated with this case has not been paid within the statutory time could you please send out the PACE questions to this parent.

EWO
alert-email-template::case-type::educati.subject: Send PACE questions to parent

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.html_body:
Dear Education Fines

Fixed Penalty Notice Number: {{ case.reference }}

The parent has not returned the answers to the PACE questions,14 days have now passed and further action needs to be taken.

Please login to the case and select Withdraw or select Legal action required.

CXM
alert-email-template::case-type::educati.subject: PACE answers have not been returned.

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.html_body:
Dear Education Fines

The answers to the PACE question have been returned for the following case. Fixed Penalty Notice Reference number: {{ case.reference }} This case now requires action.

CXM
alert-email-template::case-type::educati.subject: The PACE questions have been returned

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

The Fixed Penalty Notice reference: {{ case.reference }}  has now been paid. This now concludes this matter and no further action will be taken.

Yours sincerely,

Education Fines

key.label: Headteacher FPN fine has been paid

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.subject: The Fixed Penalty Notice Fine has been paid

alert-email-template::case-type::educati.html_body:
Dear {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.forename }} {{ case.personRelationships[0].person.surname }}

Fixed Penalty Notice reference number: {{ case.reference }}

The Fixed Penalty Notice fine has not been paid in this case and it has been decided to pass to the legal team for further review.

Yours sincerely,

Education Fines
